DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Forces entity to crouch when suppressed. Returns to previous posture when no longer suppressed. Does not otherwise interrupt movement.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>reactivetask_priority</myVariableName> <myType>integer</myType> <myLabel></myLabel> <myToolTip>The priority of this reactive task</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>4</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>1</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>reactivetask_enabled</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel></myLabel> <myToolTip>Whether or not this reactive task is enabled</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>1</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
